managed-bean.description: This bean allows to create or edit a question.
The list of tags associated with a wiki page entities.

entity-permission.name: wiki-space-create
entity-permission.sql: select ACL.ID from awa_acl AS ACL where ACL.ENTITY_TYPE = :entity_type and ACL.USER_ID = :user_id

entity-permission.name: wiki-space-update
entity-permission.description: Grant the edit permission on the wiki space owner only
entity-permission.sql: SELECT acl.id FROM awa_acl AS acl WHERE acl.entity_type = :entity_type AND acl.user_id = :user_id AND acl.entity_id = :entity_id

entity-permission.name: wiki-space-delete
entity-permission.description: Grant the delete permission on the wiki space owner only
entity-permission.sql: SELECT acl.id FROM awa_acl AS acl WHERE acl.entity_type = :entity_type AND acl.user_id = :user_id AND acl.entity_id = :entity_id

entity-permission.name: wiki-page-create
entity-permission.description: Grant the create wiki page permission when an ACL link exist betwen the user and the wiki space
entity-permission.sql: SELECT acl.id FROM awa_acl AS acl WHERE acl.entity_type = :entity_type AND acl.user_id = :user_id AND acl.entity_id = :entity_id

entity-permission.name: wiki-page-update
entity-permission.sql: SELECT acl.id FROM awa_wiki_page AS page INNER JOIN awa_acl AS acl ON acl.entity_type = :entity_type AND acl.entity_id = page.wiki_id WHERE page.id = :entity_id AND acl.user_id = :user_id

entity-permission.name: wiki-page-delete
entity-permission.sql: SELECT acl.id FROM awa_wiki_page AS page INNER JOIN awa_acl AS acl ON acl.entity_type = :entity_type AND acl.entity_id = page.wiki_id WHERE page.id = :entity_id AND acl.user_id = :user_id
